business

Interface IRestaurantProcessing

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Restaurant

    public interface IRestaurantProcessing

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double computePrice(int orderID) 
      boolean createMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem) 
      boolean createOrder(Observer chef, int tableID, java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> menuItemsNames) 
      boolean deleteMenuItem(java.lang.String name) 
      boolean editMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem) 
      boolean generateBill(int tableID) 

    • Method Detail

      • createMenuItem

        boolean createMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem)
        Parameters:
        menuItem - menuItem object to be added to the Map
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        menuItem != null;
        Postcondition:
        adds menuItem to menu Map of the object only if there's isn't already another menuItem object in the Map with the same name
        Invariant:
        using checkNullPrecondition(Object o) static method to verify the precondition

      • deleteMenuItem

        boolean deleteMenuItem(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the menuItem to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        name != null;
        Postcondition:
        deletes menuItem from the Map of the object, returning false if the menuItem with the specified name is not found
        Invariant:
        using checkNullPrecondition(Object o) static method to verify the precondition

      • editMenuItem

        boolean editMenuItem(MenuItem menuItem)
        Parameters:
        menuItem - gives the name of the menuItem to be replaces; is the replacement for the found item
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        menuItem != null;
        Postcondition:
        replaces the menuItem having the same name as the one sent as parameter from the Map of the object with the new menuItem, returning false if there's no menuItem having the required name
        Invariant:
        using checkNullPrecondition(Object o) static method to verify the precondition

      • createOrder

        boolean createOrder(Observer chef,
                    int tableID,
                    java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> menuItemsNames)
        Parameters:
        chef - Observer to be notified when CompositeProduct objects are found
        tableID - the tableID field the menuItem objects must have in order to be considered
        menuItemsNames - the names of the menuItem objects to be searched for in the menu Map
        Returns:
        true if operation is successful, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        chef != null; tableID greater or equal than 1; menuItemsNames != null;
        Postcondition:
        creates a new order with a unique ID and the menuItems with the names given in the menuItemsNames collection, returns false if no such elements exist in the menu Map; also notifies the Observer chef with the objects of type CompositeProduct found in the menu Map
        Invariant:
        using checkNullPrecondition(Object o), checkIDPrecondition(int ID) static methods to verify the preconditions

      • computePrice

        double computePrice(int orderID)
        Parameters:
        orderID - the orderID the Order key must have to be considered
        Returns:
        the total of the prices or -1 if there is no order having the orderID specified
        Precondition:
        orderID greater or equal than 1
        Postcondition:
        adds the prices of all menuItem objects of an order from the orders Map, where the Order key has the orderID equal to the one given as parameter
        Invariant:
        using checkIDPrecondition(int ID) static method to verify the precondition

      • generateBill

        boolean generateBill(int tableID)
        Parameters:
        tableID - the tableID the orders must have to be considered
        Returns:
        true if the operation is successful, false otherwise
        Precondition:
        tableID greater or equal than 1
        Postcondition:
        outputs a bill file containing all the orders from the orders Map having the tableID equal to the one given as parameter; if no order satisfying this is found, no file will be created and false will be returned
        Invariant:
        using checkIDPrecondition(int ID) static method to verify the precondition
